author: makortel
body:
Reverts cms-sw/cmsdist#8553 as agreed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8553#issuecomment-1609510937 as a precaution for the last open pre-release of 13_2_X. To be re-reverted after we open 13_3_X.

@cms-sw/orp-l2 This PR should enter in CMSSW_13_2_0_pre3 (merged preferably some IBs before cutting the release)
title: Revert "Update TBB to version 2021.9.0"
